alert.note: Alert for Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 2:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN GULF...SOUTHWESTERN LIBERTY AND NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 213 PM EDT/113 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Eastpoint, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Buck Siding, Sumatra, Chipola Cutoff, Howard Creek, Willis Landing, Beverly, Dalkeith, Fort Gadsden, and White City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
